author: Sourav Verma
text: Another power cut at 1AM, ab galliya sunke hi manoge kya. @HemantSorenJMM

author: Sourav Verma
text: Another day, another late night power cut after severals cut in day time. You are nothing less than a shame for Jharkhand @HemantSorenJMM. You can't even fulfill the basic needs of Road, Electricity & Water, hope you take out some time from your busy shedule of doing corruption.

text: Atleast 5 to 8 power cuts in a day. it feels like i'm living back in 2016-17. @HemantSorenJMM Even Villages in Bihar get atleast 23 hours electricity supply😂😂
